thread.title: ‘War for the Planet of the Apes’ Official Trailer Promises All-Out War
thread.title_full: ‘War for the Planet of the Apes’ Official Trailer Promises All-Out War

author: Renz Ofiaza
title: ‘War for the Planet of the Apes’ Official Trailer Promises All-Out War
text:
The newest trailer for War for the Planet of the Apes has released, and it’s the third chapter of the critically acclaimed blockbuster franchise, following 2014’s Dawn of the Planet of the Apes .
With Matt Reeves returning to direct as well, the film places an emphasis on Caesar and his apes in a deadly conflict with an army of humans led by a ruthless Colonel played by Woody Harrelson . As the journey finally brings them face to face, Caesar and the Colonel are pitted against each other in an epic battle that will determine the fate of both species and the future of earth.
War for the Planet of the Apes hits theaters on Friday, July 14, 2017.
Now watch the official trailer for Netflix’s ‘War Machine’ starring Brad Pitt .
